name: .BHP File Extension
summary: Learn about .BHP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use a BHP file with BonhommePendu (Windows, Mac):
Select Fichier â†’ Ouvrir une liste de mots....
Navigate to and open your BHP file.
BonhommePendu will then use the wordlist your BHP file contains.
To edit a BHP file (or view the wordlist it contains), open it with Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor.
